meanings.sent1: I always prechecked my homework before turning it in.
meanings.sent2: She prechecked her luggage before heading to the airport.
meanings.sent3: The detective prechecked the crime scene for any clues.
meanings.sent4: Before the trip, he prechecked the car's engine to ensure a smooth journey.
meanings.sent5: Prechecking the weather forecast helped us plan our outdoor activities effectively.

meanings.sent1: The prechecked documents were ready for submission.
meanings.sent2: She received a prechecked list of items for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The prechecked tickets saved us time at the entrance.
meanings.sent4: The prechecked boxes made the packing process much easier.
meanings.sent5: The prechecked answers on the test boosted his confidence.
